label: OCC
title: The OpenCitations Corpus
description: The OpenCitations Corpus is an open repository of scholarly citation data made available under a Creative Commons public domain dedication, which provides in RDF accurate citation information (bibliographic references) harvested from the scholarly literature (described using the SPAR Ontologies) that others may freely build upon, enhance and reuse for any purpose, without restriction under copyright or database law.
subject: scholarly_communication
bibliographic_database
open_access
citations

distribution.label: distribution 1 of OCC [di/1 - OCC]
distribution.title: The Open Citations Corpus: distribution in Turtle dated 3rd April 2016
distribution.description: The 3rd April 2016 distribution of the Open Citations Corpus (OCC) stored in Turtle.

subset.label: OCC / br
subset.title: The Open Citations Corpus: Bibliographic Resource dataset
subset.description: The OpenCitations Corpus is an open repository of scholarly citation data made available under a Creative Commons public domain dedication, which provides in RDF accurate citation information (bibliographic references) harvested from the scholarly literature (described using the SPAR Ontologies) that others may freely build upon, enhance and reuse for any purpose, without restriction under copyright or database law. This sub-dataset contains all the 'bibliographic resource' resources.
subject: scholarly_communication
bibliographic_database
